lead_paragraph: When Andy Murray's mother was caught on camera breaking into a wide grin as Novak Djokovic's demise flashed up on Wimbledon's Centre Court screen it was a sentiment shared by many others inside the All England Club grounds.
snippet: When Andy Murray's mother was caught on camera breaking into a wide grin as Novak Djokovic's demise flashed up on Wimbledon's Centre Court screen it was a sentiment shared by many others inside the All England Club grounds....

headline.main: Djokovic Demise Finally Gives 'Hope to the Hopeless'
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Demise Finally Gives 'Hope to the Hopeless'
